name: backend
description:
• Install NodeJS (http://nodejs.org/)
  • Install Socket.io
    • On Linux: $ sudo npm install -g socket.io
    • On Windows (Make sure and run Command Prompt as Administrator): npm install -g socket.io
  • Start server (navigate to app.js location): `node app`
  • It will run the server on your localhost using the port: 8080
